formula.name: Mandelbar
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr * (Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2) + Cr; Xin = Ci - Xi * (5 * Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Xi2 * Xi2);
formula.perturbation: xrn = 5 * Xr2 * Xr2 * xr + 10 * Xr2 * Xr * xr2 + 10 * Xr2 * xr2 * xr + 5 * Xr * xr2 * xr2 - 20 * Xr2 * Xr * Xi * xi - 10 * Xr2 * Xr * xi2 - 30 * Xr2 * xr * Xi2 - 60 * Xr2 * xr * Xi * xi - 30 * Xr2 * xr * xi2 - 30 * Xr * xr2 * Xi2 - 60 * Xr * xr2 * Xi * xi - 30 * Xr * xr2 * xi2 + 20 * Xr * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 30 * Xr * Xi2 * xi2 + 20 * Xr * Xi * xi2 * xi + 5 * Xr * xi2 * xi2 + xr2 * xr2 * xr - 10 * xr2 * xr * Xi2 - 20 * xr2 * xr * Xi * xi - 10 * xr2 * xr * xi2 + 5 * xr * Xi2 * Xi2 + 20 * xr * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 30 * xr * Xi2 * xi2 + 20 * xr * Xi * xi2 * xi + 5 * xr * xi2 * xi2 + cr; xin = ( - 20) * Xi * Xr2 * Xr * xr - 30 * Xi * Xr2 * xr2 - 20 * Xi * Xr * xr2 * xr - 5 * Xi * xr2 * xr2 + 30 * Xi2 * Xr2 * xi + 30 * Xi * Xr2 * xi2 + 20 * Xi2 * Xi * Xr * xr + 60 * Xi2 * Xr * xr * xi + 60 * Xi * Xr * xr * xi2 + 10 * Xi2 * Xi * xr2 + 30 * Xi2 * xr2 * xi + 30 * Xi * xr2 * xi2 - 5 * Xi2 * Xi2 * xi - 10 * Xi2 * Xi * xi2 - 10 * Xi2 * xi2 * xi - 5 * Xi * xi2 * xi2 - 5 * xi * Xr2 * Xr2 - 20 * xi * Xr2 * Xr * xr - 30 * xi * Xr2 * xr2 - 20 * xi * Xr * xr2 * xr - 5 * xi * xr2 * xr2 + 10 * xi2 * xi * Xr2 + 20 * xi2 * xi * Xr * xr + 10 * xi2 * xi * xr2 - xi2 * xi2 * xi + ci;
